'''1.20 Pre-release 2''' (known as '''1.20-pre2''' in the launcher) is the second pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.20]], released on May 16, 2023,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-20-pre-release-2|Minecraft 1.20 Pre-Release 2|May 16, 2023}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''Creative inventory'''
* [[Fish bucket]]s are now listed in the same order as the fish items.
* [[Dead coral]] blocks are now listed in the same order as the live corals.
* [[Wither rose]] is now grouped with other small flowers.
* [[Mangrove roots]] and [[muddy mangrove roots]] are now grouped with [[log]]s rather than [[leaves]].

=== General ===
'''[[Title screen]]'''
* Game now displays message box on startup if user enabled text-to-speech functionality, but it is not available.

'''[[Recipe]]'''
* {{cd|"item": "minecraft:air"}} can now be used to denote an ingredient that matches an empty slot.
** The following recipe types, however, do not allow for an empty ingredient:
*** {{cd|minecraft:crafting_shaped}}
*** {{cd|minecraft:crafting_shapeless}}
*** {{cd|minecraft:smelting}}
*** {{cd|minecraft:blasting}}
*** {{cd|minecraft:smoking}}
*** {{cd|minecraft:campfire_cooking}}
*** {{cd|minecraft:stonecutting}}

'''[[Tag]]'''
* Removed {{cd|d=and|sunflower|lilac|rose_bush|peony}} from {{cd|#replaceable}} block tag.
